23120: On 25 May 2018, the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) came into effect. The GDPR provides rights to European users, but, as a leading privacy company, we make the GDPR protections and rights available to all our users globally in respect of personal data (or “personal information” as we refer to it in New Zealand), wherever they may live.
23126: The solution is simple: we split each file into roughly equal-sized parts and store each of them in a different country. We also store another part (in yet another country) recording whether the number of “1” bits at a certain position within all parts is even or odd.[BR]This means that you can reconstruct your data even when one of the parts is unavailable. And best of all, your browser can connect directly to all datacentres and reassemble your file thanks to our unique JavaScript on-the-fly transfer processing engine that we also use for our end-to-end cryptography.

pricing_page_faq_answer_1: Yes, our free plan includes 20 GB of storage. You can upgrade to our Pro plans for more storage and [A]transfer quota[/A], and extra features like more security for your links.
pricing_page_faq_answer_2: Documents don’t take up much space, but media files like photos and videos do. If you’re planning on securely storing a lot of files, especially large ones, then one of our Pro plans would be best for your needs.
pricing_page_faq_answer_3: Transfer is the amount of data consumed by [A]downloading or streaming files from MEGA[/A]. Free accounts have a small, limited amount and Pro accounts are allocated a much higher capacity.
pricing_page_faq_answer_4: MEGA accepts payments in the form of credit and debit cards, Bitcoin, and vouchers provided by our official resellers.
pricing_page_faq_answer_4_2: Depending on your location, other payment methods may also be available.
pricing_page_faq_answer_5: Individual plans are designed for personal use, while our plan for businesses allows much greater flexibility in storage and transfer quota, as well as easy collaboration and a dedicated admin console to manage all users in a business.
pricing_page_faq_answer_6: Pro Flexi is a flexible storage plan billed by how much quota you use each month. The base quota for the plan is set at 3 TB of storage and 3 TB of transfer quota, billed at €15 per month. If you use any additional storage or transfer beyond your base 3 TB, you will be charged €2.50 per TB for the greater of extra storage used or extra transfer used.
pricing_page_faq_answer_6_2: For our users who want to store in excess of 16 TB this works out at the cheapest price per TB you can find, and our flexibility with costs means this is in high demand by those with lots of data to store.

referral_program_rules_l1: [L]Your MEGA account has not been suspended or terminated. [/L]
referral_program_rules_l2: [L]You and the people you refer have complied and continue to comply with these referral programme rules.[/L]
referral_program_rules_p0: [P]You are only eligible to participate in this referral programme if:[/P]
referral_program_rules_p1: [P]To be eligible to redeem your accrued commission, you must have made at least one payment by credit card or app store to us for a MEGA plan — not in Bitcoin or any other cryptocurrency or by way of a voucher.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p10: [P]We reserve the right to advise people that you refer to MEGA under this referral programme that you are receiving a commission for doing so, as required by New Zealand law.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p11: [P]We may close, suspend or change this programme at any time. Changed rules will apply to all future referrals. If we permanently close this programme, we will pay out all commissions due for payment under these rules within 90 days of closure.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p12: [P]Commission balances expire if not withdrawn within two years of being earned.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p14: [P]A qualifying commission will have a 90-day wait period before it becomes redeemable. Any breach of these rules within that period or otherwise means that the commission may be forfeited.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p15: [P]Your accumulated commission balance must be at least €50 to qualify for a redemption.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p16: [P]All commission balances are gross balances. Where we are required by any law in any country to make a deduction or withholding from any payment due to you, we will do so and pay you the net amount.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p17: [P]Depending on your country and your existing plan, we offer either payment in Bitcoin or conversion to a MEGA Pro plan. For some payments, we may also need to deduct MEGA, bank, or other third-party transaction or processing fees before paying you the net amount.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p2: [P]If the referred user creates a new MEGA account as a result of visiting your referral link, for a referral to trigger a commission to you, that person must pay for a MEGA plan within 12 months of your referral, unless they have visited another MEGA user’s referral link in the 24 hours prior to making the purchase. In that case, their referral will trigger a commission to the user that created the most recent link that the user visited.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p3: [P]If the referred user is an existing MEGA user and upgrades their plan, for a referral to trigger a commission to you, that person must pay for a MEGA plan within 24 hours of accessing MEGA through your referral link. Note that yours must be the most recent referral link that the user has accessed prior to making the purchase.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p4: [P]You must comply with our Terms of Service to be eligible to receive any commission under this programme.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p5: [P]A legally valid takedown notice received by you means that you will forfeit any relating commissions you have earned.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p6: [P]A legally valid takedown notice received by a person you have referred, or any other Terms of Service violation by that person, means that you will forfeit commissions you have earned from that person.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p7: [P]A copyright strike on your account will disqualify your account from participation for 90 days, such that no new commissions can be earned even if referrals pay for a MEGA plan during this period.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p8: [P]Repeated strikes or takedowns on your account will result in accumulated commissions being forfeited, and we may suspend your account and disqualify you from participation in this referral programme either temporarily or permanently at our discretion.[/P]
referral_program_rules_p9: [P]Where we have paid or credited a commission to you for a referral and you or that person breaches our Terms of Service, we reserve the right to deduct that sum from future commissions payable to you.[/P]

ri_s4_betat_header: Become a beta tester and get %1* worth of storage for free!
ri_s4_card1_desc: MEGA will provide S3 with [B]E2EE[/B] and security by design. With our emphasis on security your data will always be safe.
ri_s4_card3_desc: We have technology in place to [B]protect your data[/B] from loss or corruption for 99.999999999% (11 9’s) annual durability.
ri_s4_card4_desc: At %1* per TB per month, MEGA will be [B]7 times cheaper[/B] than Amazon S3, with infinite scalability and no tiering for hot or cold data.

troy_error: The link with the offer has expired or is invalid.
troy_experienced_desc: In 2013 MEGA launched the world’s first zero-knowledge encrypted cloud storage service with browser support.
troy_generous_storage_desc: Looking for a cloud storage provider that offers generous storage space and works from any device, which makes it easy to access your files and share or communicate from wherever you are? Give MEGA Pro a try now.
troy_generous_storage_desc2: Try MEGA’s Pro plan features for a month and see why we are so proud of what we build. Start your trial now, with no credit card required.
troy_generous_storage_desc3: Looking for a cloud storage provider that offers generous storage space and works from any device, which makes it easy to collaborate with your team, and share data or communicate with them from wherever you are? Give MEGA for Business a try now.
troy_generous_storage_desc4: {nbMonths, plural, one {Try MEGA for Business for an entire month, free of charge, to see why we are so proud of what we build. Start your MEGA for Business trial now with an account for 3 users and 15 TB of storage.} other {Try MEGA for Business for # months, free of charge, to see why we are so proud of what we build. Start your MEGA for Business trial now with an account for 3 users and 15 TB of storage.}}
troy_home_banner: MEGA provides fully-featured cloud storage and communications protected by zero-knowledge encryption.
troy_how_desc: MEGA strives to serve customers who value data safety, security and privacy. With that ethos in mind, we constantly improve and enhance our products.
troy_note_footer: Both offerings provide MEGA’s no-compromise, zero-knowledge encrypted cloud storage, transfers, and communications.
troy_note_switch: You can change your selection on the next page if required.
troy_privacy_desc: We believe that data privacy, including zero-knowledge encryption, is a fundamental human right. This is why MEGA is built with “Privacy by Design”.
troy_pro_free: {nbMonths, plural, one {MEGA Pro free for one month.} other {MEGA Pro free for # months.}}
troy_pro_try: {nbMonths, plural, one {Try MEGA Pro. It’s free for a month. No credit card required.} other {Try MEGA Pro. It’s free for # months. No credit card required.}}
troy_secure_comm_desc: Communicate securely and privately, exchange messages, share files with MEGA’s zero-knowledge encrypted chat which also supports audio and video calls. Have face to face meetings anytime knowing it’s totally private.
troy_secure_comm_desc2: Available across multiple platforms including mobile devices, MEGA Chat connects securely for group chat with contacts everywhere in the world, near and far.
troy_success: We’ve sent you an email to get you started with your free storage.
troy_team_3: With a team of three or more
troy_trusted_desc: Our mission is to bring the highest levels of data privacy and security to the internet. MEGA’s pioneering technology has earned the trust of over 230 million users.
troy_why_desc: To bring genuine privacy and security to the 84% of internet users who care about their privacy and their data, and want more control over how their data is being used*.
troy_why_store: Why you should store your important data with MEGA
troy_working_desc: We are building a world in which technology empowers and enables, where you and your data are not the products for sale.
troy_zero_knowledge_desc: With zero-knowledge encryption you can be confident MEGA is a private place to store your important data. MEGA does not have access to your password or your data. Using a strong and unique password will ensure that your data is protected from being hacked and gives you total confidence that your information will remain just that: yours. Our support team is available around the clock, every day of the week, with priority support for Pro users.
troy_zero_knowledge_desc2: With zero-knowledge encryption you can be confident MEGA is a very strong link in your security chain. Securely share files and collaborate with your team. Be more productive with business-specific features, including user management and password protected links. Our support team is available every day of the week, around the clock, with priority support for MEGA for Business customers.
